Title: Windows Phone 7 Silverlight MVVM Template
Description: The main goal for the Windows Phone 7 Model View View Model Template is to accelerate the development of your Windows Phone 7 application.  It implements a combination of the awesome MVVM Light Toolkit and NInject for dependency injection.
HomeWiki:
Introduction

The main goal for the Windows Phone 7 Model View View Model Template is to accelerate the development of your Windows Phone 7 application. It implements a combination of the awesome MVVM Light Toolkit and NInject for dependency injection. The template aims to separate views from your model allowing you to provide a clean and easy to maintain application. Additionally it has helpful tools to give your application full globalization support.
